result.markdown: --- title: "Graphical diagnostics" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | Slides | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:----------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |2h |Collinearity | |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2h_collinearity.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/ENOVNBOdl6E)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2h_collinearity.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2h_collinearity.R)| |2i |Diagnostic plots |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2i_diagnosticplots.html)|[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2i_diagnosticplots.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/iqfr_VK520M)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2i_diagnostic_plots.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2i_diagnostic_plots.R)| ::: ::: - Course notes: chapter 2 (sections 8 and 9) ### In class: - Collinearity illustration with `wages85` data - Graphical analysis of residuals for `college` data [(code)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A-residualanalysis.sas) - [Workshop on diagnostic plots](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/graphicaldiagnostics.html)
